name: "Nick Doom, Secret Agent" -- NICKDOOM.WAD
description: You are Nick Doom, former Space Marine and one of the few live veterans of the Hellspawn War, now a crack Corporate Security Operative for good old UAC. The trail of some stolen high- tech equipment and rumors of a zombie-run scientific lab lead you to a small building atop a desolate volcanic island. As you sneak in and the door locks behind you, you realize you probably shouldn't have left the heavy weapons outside...
